title: Low priority queue?
body: So everytime i play Yasuo my game crashes for some reason forcing me to restart because I can't minimise or close the window at all and because of this I got leaverbuster and got put in low priority queue. Is there any way I can fix this because I like playing yasuo because he is really fun but hes almost unplayable for me at this point. Is there a reason I got put in low priority queue?

replies.body: Leavebuster will not punish you if you get back into game within five minutes of leaving. What I do when this happens to me is force close League and immediately reopen it; I'm back in game before even a minute is up.
